language.entry: Beastmaster. Embodiment of nature's primal savagery.
x2 SPD if in position 4 x2 DODGE if in position 1
Kills don't leave corpses On Corpse Kill: {colour_start|healhp}Heal{colour_end} 15%% max HP
When hit if below 40%% max HP: Self: Cure {colour_start|blight}Blight{colour_end}/{colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end}
Beastmaster. Embodiment of nature's primal savagery.
x2 SPD if in position 4 x2 DODGE if in position 1
Kills don't leave corpses On Corpse Kill: {colour_start|healhp}Heal{colour_end} 15%% max HP
When hit if below 40%% max HP: Self: Cure {colour_start|blight}Blight{colour_end}/{colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end}
시체를 남기지 않음 시체를 잡으면: 15%% 최대 체력 {colour_start|healhp}회복{colour_end}
최대 체력 40%% 이하 적중: 자신에게: {colour_start|blight}중독{colour_end}/{colour_start|bleed}출혈{colour_end} 치료
